oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cabinet card of Joseph F. Massengill, Co. B, 8th Tenn. Cav. Regt. (Smith's)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Massengill was wounded at the Battle of Chickamauga. No service record found for this individual in this unit. A service record exists for a Lt. Joseph F. Massengill in Co. B, 4th (Murray's) Tenn. Cav. Regt., CSA, parts of which were absorbed into 8th (Smith's) Tenn. Cav. Regt.
